Section.name: About CUTM
Section.description:
Centurion University of Technology and Management (CUTM) is a multi-sector private state university established in 2009 in Bhubaneswar, Odisha. Centurion University Bhubaneswar is accredited with “A” Garde by NAAC. It is approved by UGC. Admission to all the courses at CUTM Bhubaneswar is done based on the merit in Centurion University Entrance Exam (CUEE). The main campus of CUTM is located in Paralkhemundi. Apart from this, it has three regional campuses in Rayagarh, Balangir, and Balasore. Centurion University of Technology and Management has 15 institutes or schools to offer higher education in different fields. The campus area of CUTM Bhubaneswar is spread over 40 acres. The university offers UG, PG, Doctoral and Diploma programmes in Engineering and Technology, Management, Forensic Sciences, Law, Pharmacy, Media and Communication, Agriculture, Allied Health Sciences, etc.
